summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, forwarding staff schedules requested by a warden from July 22 onward. It appears to be internal prison administrative correspondence, likely related to the period of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The recipient of the email who requested staff schedules from July 22 onward.

persons.name: Captain
persons.context: The individual who originally requested the staff schedules on behalf of the warden.

connections.description: The Captain is fulfilling a request from the Warden for staff schedules.

events.title: Start Date for Requested Staff Schedules
events.description: The date from which staff schedules were requested by the Warden via the Captain.

events.title: Email Forwarding Staff Schedules
events.description: An email was sent to the Warden containing the requested staff schedules from July 22 to the present.

keyFacts: Staff schedules from July 22, 2019, onward were requested by a prison warden via a captain.
The schedules were forwarded via email on August 12, 2019.
This administrative request coincides with the period surrounding Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
